practitioner.title: Dr. Emadeldin Ibrahim
practitioner.name: Emadeldin Ibrahim
practitioner.alt: Dr. Emadeldin Ibrahim, Consultant Pulmonologist, Book appointment online, Book Consultant Pulmonologist online, Al Nud, Sharjah, UAE, Okadoc - Book doctor appointment online
practitioner.about:
Dr. Emadeldin Ibrahim is a Consultant Pulmonologist in the Department of Pulmonology at Medcare Hospital- Sharjah. He received his basic MBBCh degree, an MSc in Chest Diseases and MD (Chest Diseases) from Alexandria University in Egypt. His list of impressive credentials includes the Fellowship of the American College of Chest Physicians (USA), the Fellowship of the European Respiratory Society (Switzerland), the Pulmonary Fellowship of Pulmonary and Critical Care Division, Washington School of Medicine, and a Fellowship of Vrije University (Belgium). 
He chaired the Respiratory Infections Group of the Emirates Thoracic Society and is a member of the Emirates Thoracic Society (UAE), member of the American College of Chest Physicians (USA), member of the European Respiratory Society (Switzerland), member of the Egyptian Society of Chest Diseases, and member of the Egyptian Society of Bronchology (Egypt).
Dr.Ibrahim commenced his illustrious career as an Assistant Lecturer of Pulmonary Medicine and then continued as a Lecturer and Consultant of Pulmonary Medicine with the Chest Department of the Alexandria Faculty of Medicine in Egypt.  He went on to become an Assistant Professor, then Professor and Consultant of Pulmonary Medicine at the Alexandria Faculty of Medicine. He moved to the UAE and spent a few years as a Consultant Pulmonologist and Head of the Pulmonary Department at Alzahra Hospital (Royal NMC) Sharjah. He is currently a visiting Professor of Pulmonary Medicine at the Sharjah Faculty of Medicine. 
Dr. Ibrahim’s expertise covers the diagnosis and treatment of all chest diseases including asthma, chronic obstructive lung diseases, interstitial lung diseases, lung abscess and tumours, pleural effusions, mediastinal masses and sleep apnoea. He uses the latest diagnostic procedures like fiberoptic bronchoscopy, pulmonary function testing, and arterial blood gases and is proficient at managing respiratory-related sleep disorders and infections, pulmonary sarcoidosis, pulmonary tuberculosis and bronchiectasis. He has been instrumental in managing pneumonia that is community-acquired or acquired in the hospital or ventilator-associated. 
He has been active in publishing internationally acclaimed research papers and has been a speaker at many conferences and events. Dr. Ibrahim is fond of listening to music, appreciates art and is passionate about teaching. In his leisure hours, he reads and travels. He speaks Arabic and English, fluently.

locations.name: Al Zahia – Medcare Medical Centre
locations.address: Al Zahia Uptown University City Rd - Muwaileh Commercial - Al Zahia - Sharjah
locations.about: Medcare Medical Centre in Al Zahia stands as a premium, advanced healthcare facility devoted to meeting the diverse healthcare needs of its community. This inviting medical centre prioritizes comfort and convenience, providing cuttingedge facilities and comprehensive medical services all under one roof. Ideal for patients of every age seeking precise diagnoses and prompt treatment across various specialties. At the helm of Medcare Medical Centre Al Zahia is a team of multicultural, multilingual doctors, complemented by exceptionally-trained and experienced nurses and medical staff. The centre takes pride in its extensive array of stateof-the-art equipment, empowering its highly skilled medical team to deliver a premium level of care to all patients. Experience the warmth of family-centric care delivered by our highly talented medical and non-medical staff. At Medcare Medical Centre Al Zahia, we offer a range of services, including Internal Medicine, Gynaecology, Paediatrics, Dermatology & Aesthetics, ENT, Dentistry, Orthopaedics and Physiotherapy. As part of our commitment to accessible healthcare, Medcare operates a network of four hospitals and 20 plus multi-specialty clinics across Dubai and Sharjah. Our goal is to provide reliable and timely medical care to our diverse clientele. Great News! We are expending to better suit all your medical and beauty needs!

locations.name: Medcare Hospital Sharjah
locations.about:
MedCare Multi Specialty Hospital Sharjah is a part of MedCare Network, a premium healthcare network. The hospital is a venture of Aster DM Healthcare, a global healthcare group with 317 medical establishments in 9 countries, including the GCC, India, and Africa. MedCare Multi Specialty Hospital is committed to providing high quality and personalized medical care for every patient.

MedCare has a premium healthcare network consisting of 4 multispeciality hospitals, 4 speciality centres, 9 medical centres, and over 300 experienced doctors. What makes MedCare different is the exceptional multi-cultural, multi-lingual team of doctors and physicians, who have received extensive training from medical institutes in the United States, United Kingdom, Greece, Australia, France, India, Africa, and the Middle East. The doctors and staffs listen to the patients to really understand their problems and then recommend the best step to take. MedCare’s team of doctors provide optimal guideline-based treatment to patients, with the support of a team of trained nurses, dieticians, rehabilitation therapists, and technologists.

MedCare Multi Specialty Hospital in Sharjah has a mission to develop a leading healthcare system that promotes and supports the highest standards in preventive, curative, and rehabilitative healthcare, regionally and internationally. All 4 MedCare multispecialty hospitals are accredited by the Joint Commission International, which is considered as the gold standard in healthcare around the globe.

Apart from many departments with various services, MedCare Multi Specialty Hospital also offers health packages for maternity, health checkup, and medical tourism. All the departments are led by experts in hospital quality management.

MedCare Multi Specialty Hospital in Sharjah is driven by 6 main values: Integrity, Passion, Respect, Excellence, Compassion, and Unity.

locations.name: Medcare Royal Speciality Hospital
locations.about:
MEDCARE ROYAL SPECIALITY HOSPITAL

OPENING MARCH 2024

Welcome to Medcare Royal Specialty Hospital – redefining premium healthcare just minutes away from Dubai International Airport. Our distinguished facility, with 126 beds, stands as a beacon of prestige and excellence, offering uncompromising quality in advanced medical and surgical care to Dubai residents.

Located in the Al Twar are of Dubai, the hospital services as a crown jewel of the Medcare Group of Hospitals and Medical Centres, and is expected to become a flagship facility with the UAE & GCC healthcare landscape.

 State-of-the-Art Facilities

Medcare Royal Specialty Hospital boasts cutting-edge medical technologies and infrastructure, ensuring world-class healthcare delivery. Our facilities include:

  • 4 Operation Theatres
  • 2 Endoscopy Suites
  • Advanced Radiology
  • 126 World-Class Inpatient Rooms
  • PICU Beds (3)
  • Intensive Care Unit Beds (7)
  • Laboratory & Pharmacy
  • 55 Consultation Rooms
  • Neonatal Intensive Care Unit Cots (9)
  • Robotic Surgery
  • Cath Lab
  • Oncology and Radiation Therapy
  • Transplant Unit
  • Quaternary Care

 Comprehensive Specialties

Situated at the crossroads of convenience and expertise, our 30,598 sqm facility houses over 30 specialties. We provide a range of services for swift and comfortable journeys towards complete health and recovery. Experience top-tier medical care across various specialties, including:

  • Rheumatology
  • General Surgery
  • Day Surgery
  • ENT & Sleep Lab
  • Dentistry
  • Emergency Medicine & Ambulance Services
  • Orthopaedics & Physiotherapy
  • Urology
  • Vascular Surgery
  • Bariatric Surgery
  • Plastic Surgery
  • Anaesthesiology
  • Emergency Care
  • Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation
  • Geriatrics & Homecare
  • Psychiatry

Centres of Excellence

Medcare Royal Specialty Hospital aims to establish Centres of Excellence in five key specialty areas to provide superior medical care within and outside the UAE.

  • Neurological Institute

Our Neurological Institute is a leader in treating common and complex neurological disorders, offering advanced diagnostics, surgery, treatment, and rehabilitation for conditions affecting the central nervous system.

  • Urology Services

Our premium urology practice excels in diagnosing and treating problems related to the urinary tracts and reproductive organs, with a focus on cancer treatment, fertility restoration, kidney stones, and incontinence.

  • Gynaecology Centre

The Gynaecology Program provides comprehensive care for a range of gynaecologic conditions, offering advanced minimally invasive procedures and surgeries.

  • Gastroenterology & Hepatology Sciences

Our department provides high-end care for gastrointestinal, pancreatic, liver, and biliary disorders, supported by a qualified team and state-of-the-art technology.

  • Geriatrics & Homecare Centre

Our Geriatric Evaluation and Management (GEM) services focus on improving the functioning of individuals with multidimensional needs associated with aging, offering personalized care and support.

 Service Excellence Beyond Medical Care

Our commitment extends beyond medical treatments. Experience instant appointment booking, teleMEDCARE for remote consultations, and real-time disease management programs, all designed to prioritize your well-being. Our unique Continuum of Care platform stays connected with you, post-discharge.

Unprecedented Comfort and Care

Experience a new standard in patient comfort with our exclusive offerings:

  •  Gourmet Fine Dining Experience
  • Signature Aromatherapy
  • Customized Pillow Menu
  • Luxury Bathroom Amenities in partnership with MOLTON Brown
  • Calming, Comfortable Luxury Rooms with modern amenities

Our well-trained and certified service professionals are dedicated to making your journey seamless. Medcare Royal Specialty Hospital—where healthcare meets excellence.

 These are the specialties that we offer at Medcare Royal Specialty Hospital: Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Paediatrics, Neonatal Intensive Care Unit, Internal Medicine, Gastroenterology, Pulmonology, Cardiac Sciences, Dermatology & Aesthetics, Endocrinology, Neuroscience, Nephrology & Dialysis Units, Rheumatology, General Surgery, Day Surgery, ENT & Sleep Lab, Dentistry, Emergency Medicine & Ambulance Services, Orthopaedics & Physiotherapy, Urology, Vascular Surgery, Bariatric Surgery, Plastic Surgery, Anaesthesiology, Geriatrics & Homecare, and Psychiatry.

locations.name: Al Taawun - Medcare Medical Centre
locations.address: Al Jawhara Building, Al Taawun Street, Taawun, Sharjah
locations.about:
Medcare Medical Centre (Medcare Sharjah) is a multispecialty medical center conveniently located at Al Jawhar Tower, opposite Sharjah Expo Center and beside the National Bank of Umm Al Quwain. Medcare Sharjah houses 14 doctors specialized in 11 expertises:  cardiology, dentistry, dermatology, ear nose and throat (ENT), family medicine, internal medicine, obstetrics & gynecology, ophthalmology, orthopedics, pediatrics, and rheumatology. 

With a reserved parking dedicated to patients, Medcare Sharjah welcomes people in need of diagnosis or treatment in a friendly environment. Medcare Sharjah is reputed for the friendly and attentive support that patients receive from its multilingual and empathic medical team. Considered as the UAE’s most preferred clinic, Medcare Sharjah is an ideal healthcare destination as it is fully equipped with a laboratory and diagnostic services along with an in-house pharmacy. 

Medcare Sharjah is part of 9 medical centers, 4 specialty centers, and 4 multispeciality hospitals, with over 350 highly qualified doctors in total.

In Okadoc, you can find Medcare Sharjah location and the list of doctors practicing in Medcare Sharjah. Customize your search on our website and book an appointment only on Okadoc.
